posts.post_title: FS - Vintage Postcards Polo Grounds, Yankee Stadium
posts.post_content:
For sale are five postcards listed below $75.00 shipped PayPal. Thanks Daryl
#1 National League Baseball Park(Polo Grounds) Unused Good condition
#2 New York Yankee Stadium This is a beauty unused great condition late 20's
#3 1942 New York Yankee Stadium used but front is very nice
#4 1913 Baseball Grounds, Washington Park Chicago used
#5 1950's Al Lang Baseball Field, St Petersburg, Florida used
